body.p: LIN Schedule Table Configuration can be used to configure schedule tables imported from LDF file to transmit master requests by following the below steps.

ol.li: To configure Schedule Table use LIN->Schedule Configuration menu which displays Configure Schedule Table dialog as shown below.
Configure Schedule Table window displays the Schedule Tables channel wise.

li.p: Frames will be listed under respective Schedule table.
Schedule Table name or Frame name
Frame Identifier displayed in hex mode

ol.li: To select the Schedule Table from the list, mark the respective Schedule Table as checked. By which all the frames part of Schedule Table will be selected
User can select/de-select the frame(s) by marking the frame as check/un-check.
Master request(s) shall be sent only for the selected frame(s) at pre-configured time interval as specified in the Schedule table.
Schedule Tables and Frames can be selected/de-selected during runtime.
The check status of Schedule Table and the frames will be stored in the configuration file and retained on importing configuration file.

ul.li: Schedule Tables and frames from the Configure Schedule Table window will be considered when BUSMASTER simulates the LIN Master node of a LIN network
From the LDF file imported, only unconditional frames in the Schedule Table will be considered for the configuration and execution.
